item.title: At least three dead after Kenya police open fire to disperse mourners of ex-PM Raila Odinga
item.description: The crowds were so big that the public viewing was moved from the parliament building to a stadium.

item.title: Netanyahu 'determined' to pressure Hamas to find remaining dead hostages
item.description: The Israeli prime minister's comments come after Hamas said it could not access the bodies of 19 hostages in Gaza.

item.title: EU sets 2027 target for anti-drone system to defend against Russia
item.description: It is part of a new drive for the 27-member European Union to be ready for conflict by 2030.

item.title: Bears kill seven people in Japan this year as attacks hit record high
item.description: Seven people have died since April this year - the highest number since figures started being recorded in 2006, officials say.

item.title: French PM survives major test but breathing space will not last long
item.description: SÃ©bastien Lecornu survives two confidence votes in parliament and can now focus on passing the 2026 budget.
